SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR# = ";" :SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "," :SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = "create " :SET &UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD# = "" :IF &UC4RB_DB_SMALLFILE# = "SMALLFILE" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "smallfile") :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_DB_SMALLFILE# = "BIGFILE" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "bigfile") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_TABLESPACE_TYPE# = "Permanent" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " tablespace &UC4RB_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#") : IF &UC4RB_DB_PERM_DATAFILE_SPEC# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " datafile '&UC4RB_DB_PERM_DATAFILE_SPEC#'") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_MIN_EXT_SIZE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " minimum extent &UC4RB_DB_MIN_EXT_SIZE#") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_BLOCK_SIZE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " blocksize &UC4RB_DB_BLOCK_SIZE#") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_LOGGING# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " logging") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " nologging") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_FORCE_LOGGING# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " force logging") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_DFLT_STRG_CLAUSE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " default &UC4RB_DB_DFLT_STRG_CLAUSE#") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_ONLINE# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " online") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " offline") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_DB_SEGM_SPC_AUTO# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " segment space management auto") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " segment space management manual") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_TABLESPACE_TYPE# = "Temporary" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " temporary tablespace &UC4RB_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#") : IF &UC4RB_DB_TEMPFILE_SPEC# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " tempfile '&UC4RB_DB_TEMPFILE_SPEC#'") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_TS_GROUP_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " tablespace group '&UC4RB_DB_TS_GROUP_NAME#'") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_TABLESPACE_TYPE# = "Undo" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " undo tablespace &UC4RB_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#") : IF &UC4RB_DB_UNDO_DATAFILE_SPEC# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " datafile '&UC4RB_DB_UNDO_DATAFILE_SPEC#'") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_RETENTION# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " retention guarantee") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " retention noguarantee") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_CLAUSE# = "Generate" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " extent management") : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_TYPE# = "Local" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " local") : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_AUTOALLOC# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " autoallocate") : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_UNIFORM# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " uniform") : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXT_UNFRM_MGMT_SIZE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " size &UC4RB_DB_EXT_UNFRM_MGMT_SIZE#") : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " dictionary") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_DATABASENAME# = ""
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT
